symbols.hint: To remember this kana, find the capital 'A' inside of it.
Think of a couple of eels (I) hanging out.
Notice the sideways 'U' shape right in it.
Think of it like an exotic (E) bird.
You can see the letter 'o' in here two times.
To remember this, think of someone who's doing the 'Can-Can' (Ka) dance.
To remember this, notice how much it resembles a key (ki).
To remember this, think of this kana being the mouth of a coo-coo/cuckoo (Ku) bird.
You'll have to use your imagination here, but this kana looks a lot like a keg (Ke).
Ko is a couple of co-habitation (Ko) worms.
Looks like a weird sign (where the 'si' of 'sign' is pronounced like 'Sa').
It looks like long hair. She (Shi) has long hair.
Looks like superman (Su) flying.
Looks like a syringe (sy/Se) in a arm.
This kana is just a songbird (so).
This looks just like the romaji that spells it out 'ta'.
Looks like a big chin (Chi).
Looks like a tsunami (Tsu) wave.
This kana looks like the uppercase letter 'T' where 'T' is for 'Te'.
This kana looks like someone's toe (to) with a little nail or splinter in it.
The naughty (na) nun is praying in front of the cross, asking for forgiveness.
Looks like a needle (ni) pulling the thread.
This kana looks like some noodles (nu).
This is Nelly (Ne) the cat.
Think of this as a 'No smoking' (No) sign.
This kana looks like the uppercase letter 'H' plus the lowercase letter 'a' (Ha).
He (Hi) has a big nose.
Freaky (Fu) hula (Hu) dancer.
Famous mountain Mt. Saint Helens (He).
Looks like a magician. Hocus (Ho) pocus.
Removing your head? Doubling your hands and arms? What sort of evil magic (Ma) is this?
Looks like lucky number 21. Who just hit the blackjack? Me (mi).
'Mooo' (mu), says the cow.
Look at that beautiful eye! It's so beautiful because of the makeup (Me) on it.
You want to catch more (Mo) fish so you add more (Mo) worms to your hook.
Do you see the yak (Ya) in this kana?
This kana is a very unique (yu) looking fish.
The hitchhiker has his arm and thumb out. He's yelling 'YO!' (Yo).
Looks like a rabbit (Ra).
The reeds (Ri) are swaying in the wind.
There is a loop at the end. Are there no rules (Ru) on this road?
This looks like a guy kneeling on the ground, retching (Re) up his dinner.
This kana is just a plain old road (Ro).
This kana looks like a wasp (Wa) flying straight up.
'Whoa!' (wo) yells the guy slipping on ice.
This kana looks just like the lowercase 'n' (N).
